menus

Class Fonts

  • java.lang.Object
    • menus.Fonts

  • public class Fonts
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class would provide some easier access to relevant methods for editing texts. For example changing color, font or size and positions There are 3 methodes in the class the only difference they have is in their positional input. If we didn't had x it automatically would consider the middle of the screen as the x's position. And the same for y. but we should at least have on of them.
